name: Theresa Dreams of Wheat
description:
A short, silly first-person game about Theresa May, her dwindling political power, and an attempt to flee from office and escape to the golden wheat fields with a frying pan.

Originally made in 3 days for #LDJam 39 (the theme was "Running Out of Power"), and since updated to v1.2 with more stuff and some nice bug fixes. NOTE: for anyone rating this game for LDJam39, the download includes another zip of the original release of the game that was finished in time for the jam, for fair rating purposes.

If you play it, let me know what you think. Thanks! And sorry about the swearing.

- Steve
